name: Zombie The Frag Out
description:
Zombie The Frag Out is Third person survival shooter game. Your goal is to survive the waves of zombies to escape the infected town. You can play it by yourself or bring one of your friend to play the game for better experience.

Controls:

  • Move: W,A,S,D
  • Shoot: Left mouse button
  • Scope: Right mouse button
  • Dash: Space
  • Switch weapon: Q
  • Reload: R

*Notes: wait a few seconds (~3 seconds) after entering character name before creating a game room to let the game connect to the server.

The game is made by a group of students:

  • Supendi
  • Muhammad Anshari Ramadhan
  • Farhan Almandho
  • Muhammad Danial Wahab
  • Nicholas Santoso
  • Alex Yang
